name: 'REPLICA' By The Fireplace Gift Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Clove Oil, Chestnut Accord, Vanilla Accord.Set Description:This comforting, unisex fragrance blends notes of aromatic chestnuts, smoky clove oil, and sweet vanilla to recreate the signature warmth and coziness of a crackling fire..About the Fragrance:Composed to comfort your senses, this warm and spicy perfume evokes the memory of wood crackling in the fireplace while snow falls outside..This Set Contains:- 0.34 oz/ 10 mL ‚ÄôREPLICA‚Äô By The Fireplace
ingredients: Alcohol, Fragrance, Water, Benzyl Alcohol, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Linalool, Isoeugenol, Benzyl Benzoate, Eugenol, Limonene, Benzyl Cinnamate, CI 15985/Yellow 6, Geraniol, CI 19140/Yellow 5, BHT, CI 17200/Red 33, CI 60730/Ext. Violet 2, CI 79346/1.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_title: A scent everyone seems to love

reviews.review_text: The perfect gift set. This is my favorite Maison Margiela fragrance. It‚Äôs gourmand, warm and cozy. I just love it. I‚Äôve lost count how many times that I have repurchased this set. I always get compliments on this one.

reviews.review_title: Must have for the smoky gourmand lovers
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful set, and a great deal.  I really enjoy this perfume and the sweet and smoky combination. This is so perfect for fall. Highly recommend to anyone who enjoys gourmand scents with a bit of smokiness.  The smoky note is not overwhelming. This really does remind me of sitting out by a campfire, roasting marshmallows, and all of the fall goodness. I wish there were body butters or lotions to layer with it.  I enjoy layering it with the Bath and Body Works Bonfire Bash shower gel and body cream.
i love this product, the scent is warm and cozy and it‚Äôs become one my signature scents

Where do I begin? I truly lucked out with this package. This advent calendar is such a great value! The different scents give a bit of summer and winter, so I have my year around scents ready! Absolutely in love

reviews.review_text: I love this scent. Makes me feel like I‚Äôm in a cozy cottage by the fire.

reviews.review_text: beautiful scent. at the store it smelt more feminine, but when i got home and it dried it smelt more masculine and a warm scent. would recommend

reviews.review_title: Something for 3 People in our House
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To the reviewer below me, the value of the set is $139. A 30ml bottle is $85, 10ml spray is $35, and a 7.5ml mini is between $15-20. You save $20 if you were to buy all 3 separately. My husband and teenage son, both really like this fragrance, and I like it it too, it just smells differently on them. The 30ml is great for my husband. The 10ml is great for my 15yo, and the dabber is perfect for me. If you have a similar situation, the value is great.
The value ($95) is less than the purchase price ($110)!! What joke, I mean deal

reviews.review_text: I hated this smell at first but omg it settles so beautifully into the skin. Great value for this set, i regifted the smaller bottle

reviews.review_text: Ive worn this scent for years now.. so I can be trusted in saying , this set is made from a bad batch ! It just smells of straight up alcohol. At $140.00 a set, thats terrible quality.
